etymologies: from South American Spanish, from Quechua ayawáskha, from aya ‘corpse’ + waskha ‘rope’

definitions: a tropical vine native to the Amazon region, noted for its hallucinogenic properties.

notes.text: Genus Banisteriopsis, family Malpighiaceae: several species, in particular B. caapi

definitions: a hallucinogenic drink prepared from the bark of ayahuasca

examples.text: he took ayahuasca with a shaman in the Amazon

shortDefinitions: hallucinogenic drink prepared from bark of ayahuasca
